doc:
Xavier Gélin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xavier_G%C3%A9lin 0 Xavier Gélin (21 June 1946 – 2 July 1999) was a French actor and film producer, and son of Daniel Gélin and Danièle Delorme. Through his father, he was a half-brother of Fiona Gélin and Maria Schneider, also actresses. Xavier_Gélin ( 21 June_1946 – 2_July_1999 ) was a_French_actor_and_film_producer , and son of Daniel_Gélin and Danièle_Delorme . Through his_father , he was a_half-brother of Fiona_Gélin and Maria_Schneider , also actresses .
